definition: to troubleshoot/to check components individually for problems/troubleshooting

sentences.english: The remote search server is a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 远程搜索服务器是一个单点故障点。

sentences.english: 'We are still ironing out the bugs in the system,' said Dr. Lamont.
sentences.chinese: 拉蒙特说，我们仍在消除系统中的小故障。

sentences.english: This usually occurs during failure scenarios or periods of high load.
sentences.chinese: 这种景象经常产生在体系故障或者是高负荷的景象下。

sentences.english: Failure to include substantiating facts and figures on the market is likely to result in a Fail grade.
sentences.chinese: 不包括充实市场上的事实和数字是可能导致故障品位。

sentences.english: The world famous brand electrical control components to ensure long-term trouble-free operation of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 世界名牌电器控制元器件，确保机器长期无故障运行。

sentences.english: This kind of false breakdown is one kind slants actually lubricious phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 这种假故障其实是一种偏色现象。

sentences.english: Provides a weekly report of any plant or equipment witch is Out Of Order and the action taken.
sentences.chinese: 提供发生故障的机房或设备的周报告以及采取的行动。

sentences.english: Thus, network issues are supposed to be detected and pro-actively addressed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，网络故障将会被探测并预先解决。

sentences.english: The microcomputer fault diagnosis train of thought is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对微型机故障诊断方法进行了讨论。

sentences.english: It also states a troubleshooting analysis of the undercarriages retractile system.
sentences.chinese: 还包括一次起落架收放系统的故障分析。

sentences.english: Finally we lost all the power because of the hydraulics failure.
sentences.chinese: 最后我们因为液压系统的故障失去了所有的动力。

sentences.english: We need a plan to deal with grid failures.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要应对电网故障的预案。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the measures of trouble shooting and its results were introduced in detail.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了故障的排查方法和结果。
这是一个安全无故障的设备。

sentences.english: This article counter gear pump and hydraulic cylinder's appearance's common breakdown carries on the analysis.
sentences.chinese: 本文对齿轮泵和液压缸的出现的常见故障进行分析。

sentences.english: Quad, Rail-to-Rail, fault-protected, SPST analog switch.
sentences.chinese: 轨到轨，故障保护，SPST模拟开关。

definition: oil spill/oil leak/(fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])
out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
to troubleshoot/to check components individually for problems/troubleshooting
to crash (of a computer)/Taiwanese term for 當機|当机[dang4 ji1]
to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
